content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west on southway boulevard.  as i approached the intersection of southway and u.S. 31 i noticed three bright, orange lights in the western sky in front of me.  they were just above the treetops.  the time was 9:15 p.M. i first saw one light.  then a second one developed and grew brighter.  finally a 3rd one developed and grew brighter.  they were approximately the size of a baby aspirin at arms length.  they were all steady for a brief moment and then one by one, they each sorta faded into the darkness and disappeared.  it happened rather fast, a little less than a minute.  i quickly drove to the post office parking lot where i could get a better look.  as i drove, keeping my eyes on the spot where i saw them last, i saw one more light flash on for a second or two and then it faded into the night like someone dimmed the switch.  it was very odd how it faded into nothingness from this immensely bright light.  just prior to my leaving the house for the post office, i noticed that my two outside dogs, a blonde lab and a golden retriever, were barking like maniacs at something outside.  even the inside dogs were hysterical.  and so were the birds.  (i have several pet birds)  now i wonder if it had something to do with these lights as they would have been clearly visible from my house and i know the last time i saw them, i saw them at about 7:45 pm and then my friend saw them at like 8:30 or quarter till 9, so i know they hang around for a while when they show up.  i sure would like to know what they are.  they are absolutely not an airplane or anything i have ever seen before. the weather was nice.  sky was clear and stars were abundant.  the temp was cool, approximately 36 degrees.  

and p.S. jerry:

 abbe said she was sorry she hasn't gotten back to you yet but she was planning on it.
content.summary: Bright orange balls of light in western sky again tonight

content.detailedDescription: Sky was clear with a bank of clouds hanging to the east. at approximately 10:20pm et i was walking my dog when i looked out to the eastern sky.  i noticed an aircraft heading southwest at an extreme height when i observed four unusual looking craft coming east flying low without any noise. the craft had at least 1 red light on the top in addition to flashing and static lights were not following any of the normal flight patterns. as they came east the then swerved north and started to fly away. i immediately returned to my house, 8 feet, and went up stairs to mention the sightinhg to my wife. i then looked out of the bathroom window andd called my wife to come to the window as the craft had circled around and were flying some what in a circle. again there was no noise. i then called to my son who also came to the window and thought that they appeared unusual. they gave the appearance of flying like helicopters with their quick movements but without the noise. we thought that they might have been searching for somthing but they didn't use any searchlights. after about 15 minutes they then flew off in a northwest direction. several minutes after they flew away we observed and heard several aircraft fly north usung the usual flight patterns.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 1 red light on the top in addition to flashing and static lights - wings like f-22

content.detailedDescription: It was witness by a frind between the hollywood hills and downtown los angeles ...Long cigarish and very black..In broad daylight the sun did misteriously not reflect off the object.It was massive like about 300 ft long...Then suddenly dissapeared....Witnessed by long time friend manny morales..
content.summary: Hovering moving oddly back and forth..

content.detailedDescription:
A friend and i were laying out by his pool in lounge chairs looking up at the sky talking about stars when both of us noticed a plane flying overhead at high altitude moving east, nothing new in la. then the light just stopped dead and we both said, "whoa, did you see that?" it abruptly began moving again at a right angle to it's previous course. i think it headed south a little, then without changing velocity another right angle turn headed east again.

at this point another plane approached from the east, now that both were in the sky together we could see that this new plane really was a plane as it had the typical blinking lights, red and green lights of a plane. the other light was just white.

as the "real" plane approached the white light, the white light just blinked out. at first we thought it went behind a cloud, but there were none in the sky. the real plane flew on a steady course to the west. after about ten seconds, the white light blinked on again and moved around in a pattern of right angle turns and then it took off at an amazing rate of acceleration, quickly disappearing.

my friend and i were stunned, we talked about what it could have been and nothing made sense. it was too high and to fast for a helicopter, turned too quickly for a plane or satellite. we ere a little freaked out by it all.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Light moving across sky, turning at right angles, zooming away

content.detailedDescription:
I remember this vividly as if it just happened yesterday. it was circa summer of 1979' in murietta ca. it was late evening, and the sun was settling behind the mountains to the west of town into the pacific horizon. i am not certain of the exact date, i have been conducting online research trying to find more info on this incident but can't seem to find one single article related to my testimony, frustrating. but no matter, i believe my story to be noteworthy because of the mass hysteria it caused, after all it mobilized the air force and stirred the media. i have been trying to track public records of this event but yet have found none, if anyone has information on this incident please let me know. i know what i saw was in fact a ufo, because my brother remembers it just the way i do.  

here's the story; me and my brother and some of our playmates were playing football in the field right next to my house (note i was about eight/nine years old). it was late evening and getting  dark and the sun was setting on the pacific horizon which illuminated the sky with a bright burst of orange, yellow and red. the mountains to the west of murietta cast it's shadow over us. but being determined children we were not going to let the darkness interfere with our game. something then caught my eye. i looked to the west and right above the mountain range hovering, floating not but maybe a mile above the peak, was the most strange and most awesome object i have ever seen in my life... now first let me explain that even at that age, i knew the difference between airplanes and helo's, my oldest brother was in the army and worked on cobra helicopters, and we even went to local air shows and i will tell you now, even unto this day i have never seen nor heard of any man made air craft do, what i am about to explain that this thing did in fact do.

i directed everyones attention to the object, my brother and all four of my playmates saw it. we were to young to understand what a ufo was, but we all knew what aircraft were and we were all amazed at the spectacle. it appeared as solid and as shiny as gold, as if the surface was a golden mirror that radiated it's own light. there was a line of portholes running along the length of the craft. but what was most shocking to us was that it appeared as if we were seeing shadows moving in front of the light of these portholes. as if, somthing or someone was moving about inside the craft itself, mind you these shadows were faint because the craft was far away. but these portholes were huge. it looked as if they were standing in front of these portholes taking in the view, like they were on an interstellar tour bus. the craft itself was huge, perhaps the length of three football fields. standing in central murietta ca, if you held your thumb up to the mesa de burro mountain range, the tipped ends of the ufo would peer out from either side of your thumb. this sighting lasted for about 1 to 2 minutes, and then, with no sound or warning, and without breaking the sound barrier this craft flashed in a streak headed south towards san diego. a few minutes later it streaked back towards murrieta and stopped in the exact spot that we first sighted it. my brother ran into the house to tell our parents, but they wouldn't come out because a news flash came on over the tv and reported that lax and edwards airforce base were tracking a ufo over los angeles and san diego!!! they were glued to the distraction box. the craft then streaked to the north, and was gone for several minutes and then came back, to the exact same point in the sky we first sighted it! it hovered there for a few more minutes and then streaked to the south. the speed of this craft was unreal, if you want an example i would put it's top speed near that of a polaroid camera's flash. yet you could tell which way it went because it left a brief streak of light trailing behind it. similar to a shooting star.

i then went in the house and the news people on the tv were still reporting it, they verified on the air, that both lax air controllers and edwards air force base command were in fact tracking the same ufo that me, my brother and our friends witnessed. murrietta lies between edwards airforce base and camp pendleton marine base. today, being older and more mature, and a ufo novice, i believe this ufo was curious about these installations, but that's pure speculation.

i wanted to share my story with you, because i feel it needs to be told and a record of such an event should be maintained. i am frustrated that i could find no record of this event on the internet, it was on the news for christ sake, and yet, it's as if it never happened. but i know somewhere the evidence is there, to prove that this incident did in fact take place as i described. i know it was a long time ago, but if anyone else is a witness to this incident, or if you have any information, your input is certainly welcomed. thank you.
content.summary: Murrieta ca, cigar ufo summer 1979.

content.detailedDescription:
These are additional pics of the sighting i reported a few minutes ago.

march 28, 2008.  
12:30am - 1:05am
land o' lakes, fl
content.summary: More pics of thrid (possible) ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 12:30am and i stepped outside to smoke a cigarette while i waited for a phone call.  i noticed a light in the distance.  at first i thought it was a plane but i realized that it remained stationary rather flying toward the tampa airport.  as i watched more closely i could see lights blinking red, blue, white and green very quickly.  the shape seemed to be circular because of the lights, but (i'm not sure why)i thought the overall shape or configuration of the "craft" was box-like.  (sorry if that doesn't make sense.)

i started taking pictures.  my hand is not always completly steady so i tried to zoom closer.  then i decided to walk to the wood fence surrounding my house to rest the camera on top to keep it steady to hopefully get a better picture (closer and no blur.)

several minutes had passed and the object stayed in the same position and continued to flash the colors.  i had returend to the backdoor of my house.  while i took a few more shots and a mosquito started to bother me so i stepped inside and closed the screen door.  i decided to look at the object through a pair of binoculars.  (i think this is really weird.)  i guess the screen between the binoculars and the object had some sort of effect because now the object and lights were in a straight line.  i could pretty much make out the shape of a rectangular object with three larger lights spaced and smaller blinking/flashing lights in between.  i tried to take pictures through the screen but they did not show anything but the screen for the most part.  when i stepped outside again the object was still the original circular/box shape.

about twenty-five minutes had passed and the object seemed to very slowly move away into the distance. i tried to take photos with my pentax k1000 but not sure if those will turn out because of the darkness and i had no light to even view my depth of field measurements, etc.

when i wanted to take pictures with digital camera again the object was gone.

this occured in land o lake, fl around 12:30am march 28, 2008 and lasted roughly thiry minutes.
content.summary: Third (possible) ufo sighting within about ten days

content.detailedDescription: Tonite i had a green and red orbs in my back yard. later i took some photos while i was surrounded by green orbs.
content.summary: Green and red orbs

content.detailedDescription: While driving an ambulance down hwy 401 south between garner and fuquay varina, nc (raleigh address) saw a triangle shaped object flying at aprox 1000 feet.  very low to ground making no noise.  no markings noted.  object did have red light at back left corner and a white light noted to the back right corner with no tail noted (looking up from ground).  was able to pull ahead of trees and noted object a high rate of speed over trees in distance and disapeared.  this was witnessed by two paramedics.  never seen anything like this before.
content.summary: Triangle shaped object with 2 lights flew over us very low and high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: It shined the light on my car and i got out. it then made a noise and i remember feeling excited but also a little horny. it was very odd, i realized i had an erection that was from the excitment. when i looked down the triangle had left in a quick flash of light. my cell phone stopped working. i went home and started having lots of pain in my lower stomach area. today i have pains in my head, like a head ache but much more worse. i think they are trying to communicate with me.
content.summary: The triangle came down and sat in front of me then put a light on my car.

content.detailedDescription: When i saw the ufo, my dad, bob, and i were driving to another friends' home to have a sushi bbq. then when i looked at the sky, i saw a brilliant white light floating light. many people call me a ufo enthusiast, and say i am crazy and make up stories. but i know what i saw, and what i saw was a ufo. i screamed, "dad! a ufo! look to the sky over there!"  but he couldn't look because he was driving, and bob was on the other side of the car. i was really exciting and afraid at the same time. then as the car moved on, the ufo moved behind a thick cloud, and i had lost sight of it.
content.summary: Ball of light floating in sky

content.detailedDescription: I saw the same thing the other person from colorado reported.  i thought at first it was an airplane as we have a lot of air traffic around the denver area, but there was no sound.  i watched it move slowly over head then just vanish.
content.summary: Light was silent then just vanished

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures from the horse pasture in front of my house this morning and got a picture of a very odd looking object in the vicinity of a commercial airliner.
content.summary: Odd looking object in vicinity of commercial airliner

content.detailedDescription:
I was on mines rd. north of laredo, texas. i saw four or five lights, north north east of me, that would blink. they would blink three or four times, sometimes just one would blink and other times two or three at a time. they were moving around as well but not in a straight line. just randum movement. if they had blinked stedily i would have thought they were planes but they only blinked on for a few seconds then nothing.
i tried to think of what could behave like that but came up with nothing.
lights in the sky that blinked. oh wow.
i wasn't going to even consider saying anything but after what was happening in stephonville, i figured maybe this would add to someone elses sighting.
they were high and far away, maybe over the artesia wells, texas area.??
content.summary: Four or five blinking lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my garage window (looking west to east)and a triangular object just appeared in my line of sight.  it had 5-6 lights, was slightly tilted (which enabled me to see the triangular shape)and appeared to be much larger than an aircraft.  my view was not obstructed in any way. it slowly moved from south to north  for approx. 2-3 miles and then just disappeared. right before it disappeared, it moved slightly toward some bare trees that are a block over from my home. i could still see it clearly through the branches.  there is a municipal airport in that direction, so i am very used to seeing small aircraft, plus i live in the dfw area, so i also see a lot of commercial aircraft as well. i have been a radiographer (x-ray technologist)for 11 yrs. which requires me to be a keen observer. i also have perfect vision. there was no mistake! it had too many lights, and the lights were not in the same places as they would be on a conventional aircraft. when the craft disappeared, i immediately stood up and began to look for it, it was gone. it almost seemed like it turned in on itself.  i wasn't going to report this, but after thinking about the importance of it all, i decided to go ahead.
content.summary: Triangular shape with 5-6 lights appeared and then seemed to disappear

content.detailedDescription:
As posted on nuforc.
http://www.Nuforc.Org/webreports/043/s43094.Html

saucer shaped object hovering on ridge between two mountain peaks..About 300 yds out.

i don't recall the exact date,i believe around feb.1979 outside of helena,montana..Around 9:30am my boss had sent a co-worker and i to welch's truck stop in garrison, montana to pick up a dump truck and drive it back to helena.
we started out around 9:10 and headed west on hwy.12 towards garrison,as you drive west on the outskirts of town,hwy 12 narrows from a 4 lane to a 2 lane road and enters a narrow canyon.
i was looking out the passenger window as we drove along the hwy..Just after we passed the blue cloud ranch,i looked out i saw a saucer shaped object hovering between to mountain peaks..About 300 yds out and 250ft elevation.
i glanced at it and then did a double take as i realized what i was seeing.
i yelled "what the hell is that?"and when i did the driver looked over and caught a glimpse of the object.
we turned around at colorado gulch rd. and headed back to get another look.
just as we turned around and headed back,we saw the object slowly descend behind a peak and out of our view...It descended at about a 45 degree angle.
we stopped along the road,amazed at what we saw...We then turned around and headed back towards garrison.
when we returned back to helena,we told my boss and our co-workers what we saw..
everybody kinda chuckled and we went about our business.
i had made of drawing of the object with time and date on a piece of paper and kept it,but have now since lost it.

the object was saucer shaped,the skin looked like shiney aircraft aluminum, it had a red stripe across the mid section,and when it descended,we observed what looked to be a tail fin.
i thought about reporting it at the time but i didn't,also i thought about asking the residents in the area if they had seen anything unusual..But i never followed up on it.

a note of interest,the land behind where we saw this object is a military reservation..Fort william henry harrison, birth place of the special forces.. green berets,rangers etc. they have annual mountain warfare training there in the summer and winter.
content.summary: Hovering silver disc

content.detailedDescription: For about 5 minutes, i watched a trio of bright unblinking lights in triangle pattern move from the southwest to the northeast until they disappeared beyond the horizon. i could not accurately judge size of craft or distance from my location. i couldn't hear any noises or see any flames. i hope it lands next time so i can hop onboard!
content.summary: Bright unblinking lights in triangle shape

content.detailedDescription: I often sit on my patio watching for shooting stars.  i live right in line of moffet field's landing approach and enjoy watching the planes coming in for landing. so, i've seen just about every type of plane, helicopter, you name it.  anyway, i was starring up and all of the sudden a craft appeared coming from the west direction.  it had two white lights that seemed to be the front and rear.  if i had to descrive the dark body it would be like a tear drop or figure eight shape.  i would estimate that it could have been anywhere from 3 to 5 thousand feet in altitude based on two plane in the area as well, which i used as a reference point as the object flew by.  it was traveling at least 3 to 5 times faster than anything i've seen coming into moffet or even into san jose, oakland or sfo.  and i watch a lot.  it had absolutely no sound and i watched it for about 10 seconds until it traveled too far east and out of my sight.  very cool indeed.  this is my fifth siting in my life and the best one yet.  i 've had one sighting phoenix (not the famous lights like you always hear about) about 8 years ago, two sighting in santa clara, and two here in sunnyvale.  the one tonight was by far to most exciting.
content.summary: Two lights that had consistant spacine, maybe front and rear light of a craft

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my couch near a back window, which is my normal sitting spot.  i sit there because i always look out the window at birds, airplanes, etc. and the window sill makes for a good place for me to set my coffee, phone, remotes, etc. as we have no end tables. i looked up and watched as this strange white light crossed the sky moving from west to east on the south side of my home, about 1-2 miles south. at first i noticed that it was a constant light and wasn't strobing like the airplane traffic that usually crosses.  so i thought well i guess its a sattelite or something, but it was very bright and clear and didn't look like it was at a very high altitude. i grabbed my binoculars which hang on my coat rack (i frequently watch military traffic to and from ft carson, as i'm a veteran and find such things interesting). i went out on my back deck to look with the binoculars. again even through my high quality binoculars, all i could see was a solid white light, but also saw two aircraft in the same area with their blinking lights as usual. i called to my wife to come out and look at it, of which she did. she too, could only see a white light and being somewhat ignorant to anything that fly's failed to see anything strange about this solid white light. even after seeing other aircraft with blinking lights around it. it then began to travel slightly north and was obscured by the corner of our house.  i then ran to the front of the house and was able to see it again. i would guess it was about 3-4 miles (to the east) away by now.  as i watched it, it turned almost directly north bound at a 90degree turn, i estimate the speed was 300-400mph during the entire flight that i saw. after the turn it continued to fly at the same altitude (this never changed). i began to second guess myself because i thought it was an airplane on approach to land at centennial airport (even though it had just made a 90 degree turn at high speed).  just as i was about to dismiss the thing as some strange sattelite or something, it just dissappeared in front of my eyes as i watched it through the binoculars. very, very, strange.  i noticed that my neighbors across the street were still working in their backyard, which faces that direction, and asked them if they saw it, but unfortunately they were doing yard work and had their noses in the dirt. i don't know what to make of this but it is strange.  about 30 minutes later i called my friend in grand junction colorado (300 miles west) to confirm our elk hunting plans as our applications are due in a few days, and his wife had seen the very same looking object not more than about 20 minutes earlier heading east. i don't know if its coincidence, but i'm very interested in hearing if anyoneelse has seen this thing today. as for describing my "reactions, feelings, ect", i had an amazing ufo experience about 10 years ago way more remarkable that scared the hell out of me, but i just don't know what to make of this one. it didn't look at all like what i saw 10 years ago, but all i could see was the light, but even that was a different color than last time. i'm just really interested in what this could be. i even referenced to see if nasa had something going on and almost thought i had it, but the shuttle landed before this happened. has anyone reported anything similar today?
content.summary: I watched it fly past my house at about the same altitude as air traffic

content.detailedDescription:
3/26/2008 elk ca 8:31-2 pm   checking my grill to see if i should throw the pork shoulder on yet, my dog began barking to the ne. she has a different bark for catching scent some wildlife out in the woods and for telling me that some one has arrived on the property. this bark was the latter, so it got my attention. i looked up from the grill to the ne at my barking dog, in the reflection of my truck windshield i see a bright white light, that began to fade out. i turned around to face almost due sw and caught the end half of the light fading nearly strait up in the air travelling almost due ne. silently. my initial thought was that i had just caught the end of an irridium sattelite flash. as just as i was thinking how fortunate i was to have seen even the end half of an irridium flash by sheer chance, it got bright again. very bright. almost to bright to look at. a few seconds later it began to fade and i had mild light spots in my vision.(not sure what their called but like when you look at the sun, only not as intense). i was a bit enthralled with this light so it didn't occur to me to look down and see if i could see the light on the ground, but it was far brighter than anything i've ever seen in the sky. when it pulsed it dimmed to an orange-ish light as when a sodium halide light is turned off. the light's shape was an uneven oval, the long arc on the left side was like a soft angle rather than a curve. it took longer to fade out than fire up and i watched it pulse 6-8 times before it sank below my fairly proximal tree line. i watched it 30 - 40 seconds. my dog only barked when it was lit up bright and did this for about 70 seconds after it went out of sight. the tree line is about three hundred feet from me and i'd estimate about a 45 degree angle from my vantage. i couldn't make an estimate of how high in the sky it was being near dark and no noise to judge by. but it moved about the same speed as the coast guard helicopters do when they fly over at about 4-6000 feet (with significantly more noise of course). it flew in a strait line, due ne never changing trajectory or velocity that i could detect. 
the pork shoulder was uneffected by all this and delicious.
content.summary: Very bright gradually dimming pulsing white light. oval. silent. about 5-6 seconds per pulse.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 0735 on 3-25-08 a disc type object was observed by me moving from north to south from the direction of carson city toward the minden airport.  the disc decended from a cloud deck at about 8k just beyond a mountain near what is known locally as johnson lane.  it performed a series of tight right hand turns just inside the bottom of the cloud deck and then exited straight up thru the deck and disappeared.

distance from my observation point to the disc is estimated at 1.5 miles to 3 miles.  the turns were noted as high speed and almost right angle turns which would be impossible for conventional aircraft.  no noise was detected during the observation of piston or jet aircraft.
content.summary: Ufo came over mountain, performed impossible maneuvers and left straight up

content.detailedDescription: one night on july 3rd it was about 9:00pm when me and my family went to sleep but i just stood awake and stared outside of my window into the sky. about 2 hours later i realized a bright star and it caught my attention so i stared at it for a while and slowly five smaller stars came out from the brighter star and the smaller stars started circling the big star and it was moving around. i was really amazed at what i was seeing. then i saw it fly away really fast. i tried waking up my brother to tell him but he was fast asleep. i wasn't too sure it was a ufo that i saw until i watched the history channel about 2 months ago and they showed the same ufo i saw and so i was sure i saw a ufo. i couldnt sleep that night because i couldnt belive what i just saw.So then i came to this website to report me ufo sighting.
content.summary: One big star in the center with five circling it.

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 8:25 in the pm. not a cloud in the sky.
   
it was very bright, brighter than any of the stars at that time, as bright as any star or planet i've ever seen.
   
it was at pretty high altitude, i'd guess at least 10,000 ft & moving slowly, about the speed of a slow moving commercial jet.
   
but it was a warm white light, like a star, with no red beacon light & no flashing strobe like a normal airplane. also, it was heading south to north, which i never see airplanes go in the skies here. also, airplanes heading away from you do not look like bright stars.
   
after it went out of sight an airplane crossed its path at a similar altitude, which was a great reference because you could clearly see that the lights were totally different, as well as the ufo was going much slower.
   
also, the ufo made a couple of abrupt turns, about 20-30 degrees each, in a way that airplanes & helicopters can't. it also seemed to slow down almost to a stop at one point, then sped up again.
   
it also went from very, very bright to extremely dim, almost out, then back to very, very bright. and there is not a cloud in the sky, which you can see from the satellite image i just got from the weather channel's website (see attached).
   
it also didn't make a sound, which is not unusual, but several planes flew over within a few minutes & 2 out of 3 were easily heard. and it was very, very quiet out here.
   
one other thing, is that it sometimes it seemed to leave a small brief trail of smoke or vapor behind it, but i thought that was maybe a trick of my eyes. but then i watched that plane fly through the same area a couple of minutes later & it didn't do that.
   
i've watched the skies extremely carefully for about 20 years, i can tell the difference between a plane, a helicopter, a balloon, a shooting star, a satellite, weather, etc. this didn't fit into any of the normal categories.
   
i'm not saying this was aliens, but it was unidentified, flying, & an object, hence the term ufo. also i have only had one-third of one beer! anyway, i just wanted to write down all of the details while they were fresh in my mind.
content.summary: Very bright star-like

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped outside and noticed a very large orange glow to my left. 
i saw this "acorn-shaped" object growing in size- hovering over the rooftops. it was transparent on the bottom half. i ran inside and grabbed my sony handycam hi8-- and yelled for my girlfriend to come see. by the time i started filming, it was already moving away and shrinking.

here is a link to the video:
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=jg4fyb7tzb0
  

i am a mufon f.I. here in miami and would like to be assigned this/my case. i had forgotten to report this sighting afterwards because i was a little stunned by the whole thing. 

i've emailed mary margaret informing her of my(this) sighting. my ssd is bland p.

thank you

alexander lugones
content.summary: Acorn ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I noticed a long balloon like object at about 4000 ft nw of the base of haleakala drifting along to the sw.  i don't think this was alien but man-made but still unusual and should be noted.  photographed w/ a 500mm telephoto, silvery/grey in color, changed shape w/ wind currents.

i 1st noticed the object checking summit clouds from my front yard, i thought it was an odd looking object, i've never have seen anything like it before.  my feelings were that it was an odd floating object blowing w/ the wind currents till it blew out of sight.
content.summary: Acted more like a cylinder shaped balloon

content.detailedDescription:
At around 4:45am i awoke got dressed and left the house for an early breakfast,had an early flight back to the states.Opened the car entry
gate and re-locked it with a chain.The time now was approx. 5:10am,then
proceded to cross rt.115 a short distance to the bakery.I found it closed
and would have to return at 6:00am.As i walked back,crossed the road and
as i started to un-lock the chained gate i looked up at the stars,i was facing west looking out toward the ocean i noticed 2 bright objects that looked like stars traveling very fast one behind the other in a south-west
direction.There size i would say slightly smaller than a dime at arms distance.I tried to capture a video from my cell but wasn't able to,i glanced at the time on the cellphone and it was 5:20am.
the height was a little more difficult,still dark looking west,best guess would be 10000-15000 ft.,i watched in awe as they flew across and disapeared in the direction of lajas,cabo rojo.An area known for sightings
later that morning after 7am i was telling my cousin what i had seen and the local morning news was reporting the incident and someone had managed to capture a video that was shown that morning.
i would just like to add a few more details,there was no sound that i could tell.They were traveling very fast,i knew the moment i saw them
what they were,i see aircraft flying into jfk-la guardia all the time,
the lights were to big and did not strobe.They flew in a straight line
formation and were out over the ocean off the coast of rincon,corsega
beaches as it dissapered into clouds as it reached the se coast.
content.summary: Two very fast bright spheres traverse the early morning sky off the west coast of puerto rico

content.detailedDescription: While on vacation in orlando, fl. with my friends, my friends and i were relaxing in the hot tub enjoying our frozen fruity cocktails trying to ease away the tension our children caused us when we visited disney world.   we were on our fourth or fifth cocktail when all of a sudden we heard what we can only describe as an "earth shattering kaboom" followed by seeing an object traveling low in the sky from west to east too rapidly to be an airplane.  my friends assured me that i was not seeing things and that they too heard the loud "kaboom" noise.  while we are confident that this event will be thoroughly investigated by your organization, we feel obligated to inform you that we have both video and photographic evidence of this event and we shall not be ignored.  thank you for your diligent work in solving these mysteries.  na-nu, na-nu.
content.summary: Lound earth shattering kaboom followed by sighting of two rapidly traveling lights low in the sky going west to east.

content.detailedDescription:
My brother and i were in his backyard by the pool by the barbeque grill when i noticed a movement in the corner of my eyes just about treeline level. the object was a dark brown disc shaped object with a raised center, but a smooth underbelly. the object was about a quarter mile away at an altitude of about 1,000 ft. the object was moving in a southerly direction at about 60 knots and made no sound.

i quickly asked my brother to look up and tell me that i was seeing what i thought i was seeing. as he looked it was just going behind the top of a tre and then it was again visible for agbout five more seconds before disappearing again behind the tree line as it moved from right to left above the treeline.

we both confirmed what we say as he also said it looked brown.

my brother works for the newark star ledger and is a pulitzer prize winning photo journalist. figures, we were at the grill and his camera was in the house on his desk.

i wanted to wait for some time before i reported the event to be sure that i internalized what me and my brohter both saw that early evening. 

the event occured in broad daylight with partly cloudy sky's, it was not an airplane or blimp.


i am a member of mufon's newly formed star team and am available to discuss the event further.
content.summary: Dark brown disc appeared between the treeline traveling in a straight path, no sound.

content.detailedDescription: This my 3rd ufo sighting in my life - most amazing - other than being ufo's, they have nothing else in commen.
content.summary: I steped out of my door to smoke, looked up and saw a very large white hockey puck looking struction, saw it brake horizen to over my head in approx 4sec. left no trail .
